Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.entities

Class Record

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.entities.Record
public class Record extends Object
Represents a financial record in the accounting system.

  • Constructor Details

    • Record

      public Record(Double amount, String description, DateAndTime dateAndTime, Category category, RecordType recordType) throws InvalidAmountException
      Constructs a new Record with provided details.
      Parameters:
      amount - the financial amount of the record (must be positive).
      description - the description of the record.
      dateAndTime - the date and time of the record occurrence.
      category - the category this record belongs to.
      recordType - the type of the record (income or expense).
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - if the amount is non-positive.

    • Record

      public Record(long id, Double amount, String description, DateAndTime dateAndTime, Category category, RecordType recordType) throws InvalidAmountException
      Constructs a Record with the specified details, including an externally provided ID. This constructor is typically used when recreating a Record from stored data where the ID is already defined.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the record.
      amount - the financial amount of the record (must be positive).
      description - the description of the record.
      dateAndTime - the date and time of the record occurrence.
      category - the category this record belongs to.
      recordType - the type of the record (income or expense).
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - if the amount is non-positive, ensuring the integrity of the financial data.

      Gets the financial amount of the record.

      public long getId()
      Gets the unique ID of the record.

      public RecordType getRecordType()
      Gets the type of the record (income or expense).

      the record's date and time.

    • getCategory

      public Category getCategory()

      Returns:
